name: JAZZ CAT DILEMMA
description:
Jazz Cat Dilemma

Help! This cool cat running late for his gig, and every second the club owner is docking his pay! Get him there as fast as you can and help him dodge the cars or he’ll have to pay for tips, you dig? No matter what, you're going to end up with less money than promised. But that's ok, you do it for the fun. You do it for the jazz, baby!

Controls:
A - Left
D - Right

Programming: Prasad
Sound Design: Travsul
Art Design: NetroAlex
